solution_line_template: Jeff was able to run a total of {minutes_per_hour} x {num_days_mon_to_wed} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{num_days_mon_to_wed}={mon_to_wed_total}>>{mon_to_wed_total} minutes from Monday to Wednesday.
On Thursday, Jeff ran for {minutes_per_hour} - {thursday_short} = <<{minutes_per_hour}-{thursday_short}={thursday_minutes}>>{thursday_minutes} minutes only.
On Friday, he ran for {minutes_per_hour} + {friday_extra} = <<{minutes_per_hour}+{friday_extra}={friday_minutes}>>{friday_minutes} minutes.
Therefore, Jeff ran a total of {mon_to_wed_total} + {thursday_minutes} + {friday_minutes} = <<{mon_to_wed_total}+{thursday_minutes}+{friday_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.
